# How Serverless Works ‚öôÔ∏è

## Traditional:
```
Always-on server ‚Üí Pay 24/7
```

## Serverless:
```
Event ‚Üí Function runs ‚Üí Pay per use
```

## Benefits:
| Benefit | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| No servers | Provider manages |
| Auto-scale | 0 to millions |
| Pay per use | Only when running |
| Focus on code | No ops |
